about_the_game:
ME-OS is a vast operating system simulator full of infinite possibility! It comes with tons of games, software, secrets, and story. You are free to play through any part of this game in any order and explore every nook and cranny that the OS has to offer, but even more... you can find out about the secret world that it came from!

FEATURES

  • Many preloaded games right off the bat in different fun genres such as platform fighter, marble racer, rhythm game, level builder, rage platformer, and much more.
  • Different programs are included as well which have actual functionality such as a paint program, file editor, video player, music player, etc.
  • Games, programs and other features of ME-OS are linked to each other in terms of progression. Achieving something in one game will probably unlock you something in another, sometimes a whole bunch of things!
  • You can play with friends locally, over LAN, or even online! Several games have been made with online compatibility in mind, so you can have fun with everybody.
  • Secrets are all over the place. They can be hidden in the OS files (which you can explore in game), in different games, and more.
  • A story that is conveyed through each little part of the OS to help paint a bigger picture of the world it came from.

STORY

ME-OS was an operating system that suddenly came to Earth, made with human technology but seemingly from another world. It seems to be oriented much more on the fun side instead of the practical side of things, but all the creatures and locations shown in the game appear to be from the same universe. What will you be able to learn and find out through experiencing the OS for the first time?

name: ME-OS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A packed operating system simulation game that came from another world! Play through tons of preloaded games of various genres such as platform fighter, marble racer, first person shooter, rage platformer, level editor and have fun using the preloaded software too. Play alone or with friends!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
